post:
Hello,
We have around 15x servers which we no longer need, available in Dacentec, NC. We can transfer to your account when you continue the colocation with Dacentec for $40/mo: https://billing.dacentec.com/hostbill/colocation-lenoir.php
or we can ship to continental U.S. (+ packing fees ($50) and buyer must provide shipping labels).
Here is the list: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1whA8SPjS685BuRvdTdKiss8Gz_4EIVUwU_YOSOLQuGA/edit?usp=sharing
They are in perfectly working condition. We accept Paypal, Bank Transfer and Bitcoin.
Would like to sell in bulk, please drop me a PM with the offer.
